<h3 id="X38191">X(38191) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(6), X(8), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 5*(b+c)*a^2-2*(b^2+c^2)*a+3*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38191) = X(6)+2*X(3626) = 5*X(10)-2*X(141) = 7*X(10)-4*X(3844) = 7*X(141)-10*X(3844) = 2*X(597)+X(34641) = 2*X(1386)+X(3625) = X(1992)+5*X(3679) = X(3242)-4*X(3634) = 3*X(38023)-7*X(38047) = 6*X(38023)-7*X(38049) = X(38023)-7*X(38087) = 4*X(38023)-7*X(38089) = X(38047)-3*X(38087) = 4*X(38047)-3*X(38089) = X(38049)-6*X(38087) = 2*X(38049)-3*X(38089) = 4*X(38087)-X(38089) = 4*X(38136)-5*X(38146) = X(38136)-5*X(38165) = X(38146)-4*X(38165)</b>
<p>X(38191) lies on these lines: {6,3626}, {8,16475}, {10,141}, {511,38127}, {515,38116}, {516,38144}, {517,38136}, {519,38023}, {524,38098}, {551,9053}, {597,34641}, {758,38193}, {952,38118}, {1386,3625}, {1503,38155}, {1992,3679}, {2802,38192}, {3242,3634}, {3244,3589}, {3416,4691}, {3564,38176}, {3617,3751}, {3618,3632}, {3717,29659}, {3753,34378}, {3755,28522}, {3918,24476}, {3919,9021}, {4060,16972}, {4078,33165}, {4085,28516}, {4104,29667}, {4356,4439}, {4669,5846}, {4745,15533}, {4899,32784}, {5085,28236}, {5844,38167}, {5845,38201}, {5848,38213}, {5849,38214}, {5850,38185}, {5853,38194}, {5854,38197}, {5855,38198}, {14561,28234}, {25406,37712}, {32941,38048}, {33163,35258}</p>
<p>
X(38191) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {8, 16475}, {25406, 37712}<br>
X(38191) = reflection of X(38049) in X(38047)<br>
X(38191) = {X(38047), X(38049)}-harmonic conjugate of X(38089)<br>
</p>
